name: dependencies
description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: help wanted
description: Needs help from the community / Extra attention is needed

name: invalid
description: Not resolvable in any way / This doesn't seem right

name: question
description: Contains a question that needs to be answered / Further information is requested.

name: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on

name: size/XS
description: Denotes a PR that changes 0-9 lines, ignoring generated files.

name: size/S
description: Denotes a PR that changes 10-29 lines, ignoring generated files.

name: size/M
description: Denotes a PR that changes 30-99 lines, ignoring generated files.

name: size/L
description: Denotes a PR that changes 100-499 lines, ignoring generated files.

name: size/XL
description: Denotes a PR that changes 500-999 lines, ignoring generated files.

name: size/XXL
description: Denotes a PR that changes 1000+ lines, ignoring generated files.
